hostname PE_B
buggy
!
logging buffered debug 10240
logging file debug /rtr/run/logs/freertr.log
logging rotate 655360000 /rtr/run/logs/freertr.old
logging syslog informational local7 172.20.20.1
!
crypto rsakey rsa import $v10$
!
crypto dsakey dsa import $v10$
!
crypto ecdsakey ecdsa import $v10$TUhRQ0FRRUVJQUNzRWRpS1JhamFKUnArUWRqTmhpb2NOQWZJVk0vVXhUSkludjBlMExob29BY0dCU3VCQkFBS29VUURRZ0FFSnpHSFh1NXJ2RG9aUXc4UlZ1STE4eS9TREYrQmVDQkRQTkh5T0Y5ak1VYUZ0WHhiZWJEeVFBT0RoVytVZTAzbWY3MXZudHN3djR3MlpSZXpVT1B3VkE9PQ==
!
aaa userlist usr
 username rare
 username rare password $v10$cmFyZQ==
 exit
!
scheduler errors
 time 600000
 delay 30000
 command clear errors freerror@nop.hu
 start
 exit
!
access-list custB_Filter
 sequence 10 permit all 100.50.81.0 255.255.255.248 all any all
 sequence 20 deny all any all any all
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL4
 sequence 10 permit 0.0.0.0/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL6
 sequence 10 permit ::/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
bundle 110
 exit
!
bundle 111
 exit
!
bundle 30
 exit
!
vrf definition DEF_SEGROUT
 rd 100:2
 rt4import 200:200
 rt4export 200:200
 rt6import 200:200
 rt6export 200:200
 exit
!
vrf definition OOB
 exit
!
router ospf4 10
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 router-id 100.100.100.2
 traffeng-id 0.0.0.0
 segrout 500 base 12000
 area 0 enable
 area 0 spf-ecmp
 area 0 segrout
 ecmp
 exit
!
interface loopback1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 100.100.100.2 255.255.255.255
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 passive
 router ospf4 10 segrout index 5
 router ospf4 10 segrout node
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle110
 description P1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.129.1 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 2000
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle111
 description P2
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.129.5 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 2000
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle30
 description CE_B
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 100.50.81.2 255.255.255.252
 ipv4 access-group-out custB_Filter
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet1
 description [B30]CE_B
 bundle-group 30
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet2
 description [B110]P1_eth2
 cdp enable
 bundle-group 110
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet255
 description MGMT
 vrf forwarding OOB
 ipv4 address 172.20.20.3 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
 no log-link-change
 exit
!
interface ethernet3
 description [B111]P2_eth2
 cdp enable
 bundle-group 111
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
router bgp4 65000
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 local-as 65000
 router-id 100.100.100.2
 address-family labeled vpnuni
 !
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 remote-as 65000
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 local-as 65000
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 address-family labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 distance 200
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 additional-path-rx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 additional-path-tx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 update-source loopback1
 template BGP-LU-ASBR1 segrout
 !
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 remote-as 65000
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 local-as 65000
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 address-family labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 distance 200
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 additional-path-rx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 additional-path-tx labeled vpnuni
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 update-source loopback1
 template BGP-LU-ASBR2 segrout
 !
 neighbor 100.100.100.100 template BGP-LU-ASBR1
 !
 neighbor 100.100.100.200 template BGP-LU-ASBR2
 !
 !
 redistribute connected
 exit

console0
 no exec authorization
 no login authentication
 exit

proxy-profile OOB
 vrf OOB
 exit
